text: 6.4: 2 Ko 4.2Nza Fhe Bakɨmen ŋaara gumgi ki. Nza maaŋ muuŋgiap, nza zazera wari won tɨvar vhuun kha gumgi gu mbigi khɨvi. Nza mbarkɨrga simtɨgi nzan him, nza thivgia havhargiap, vhɨra tɨva mbatɨgar nza mbui bigi, simtɨgir nza ndɨɨi bigi, vhɨra nzan farfagi bigi, nta nzan him, nza vhɨra thivgia havhargi.
